episodes.title: Interviewing a former SCIENTOLOGIST | Worldviews Ep. 16
episodes.description:
A conversation with Michael who spent 10 years in Scientology. 

**TIMESTAMPS**

00:24 How Michael’s family got into scientology
7:04 The demographic makeup of his scientology community
8:15 Having doubts in Scientology
9:29 Relationships in Scientology are kept surface level
11:22 Experiencing culture shock after leaving Scientology 
13:47 Transitioning from Scientology to Catholic School
17:08 Attending a Christian University
19:49 Michael’s thoughts on God and Christianity 
21:50 Michael is now an agnostic
23:46 Would Michael prefer if God was real? 
25:45 Michael’s thoughts on death, the universe, and consciousness 
32:08 Who Michael still talks to from his life in Scientology 
36:05 Biggest challenges as a Scientologist
39:56 Lying in Scientology  
42:28 Tom Cruise
43:33 What Michael deeply respects about Scientology 
49:32 South Park & Scientology 
51:25 Michael’s thoughts on Aliens
54:37 What makes Scientology attractive? 
1:00:09 Questions to ask God
1:05:31 Michael’s closing thoughts
